head.description: General Settings for the Stopwatch Applet

refreshInterval-spinner.tooltip: Increase or decrease this spinner value to change the refresh interval - use a slow refresh if you have multiple active counters and/or a slow machine

counterTitle.description: Provide a meaningful title to the counter
counterTitle.tooltip: This forms the first part of the tooltip and is useful for identification if you have multiple instances of counters - default is Stopwatch

modeContinueCounting.description: Check box to continue counting on clicking applet when paused
modeContinueCounting.tooltip: Normal sequence on clicking is 'start -> pause -> reset' this changes to 'start -> pause -> continue -> pause -> continue etc'. In this mode one has to use the Right Click (Context) Menu to reset the counter

displayFullPanel.description: Check box to Display Title in Panel
displayFullPanel.tooltip: This provides a more comprehensive panel display but may use more panel space

enableExperimentalFunctions.description: Check box to enable some extra functions - Needs Cinnamon Restart
enableExperimentalFunctions.tooltip: Provides extra functions requested by users
